metadata.title: CVE-2022-46391 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
AWStats 7.x through 7.8 allows XSS in the hostinfo plugin due to printing aresponse from Net::XWhois without proper checks.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-46391` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

awstats - 7.4+dfsg-1ubuntu0.4+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: awstats package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.4+dfsg-1ubuntu0.4+esm2').
